item.title: MNIST Numbers
item.description: MNIST Handwritten Recognition An artificial neural network algorithm that recognizes handwritten numbers was created and an accuracy of 98% was achieved.

item.description: Financial Statement Analysis and Valuation A full analysis and valuation of Johnson and Johnson financial Statement.

item.description: Credit Card fraud Detection The overall goal of this project is to distinguish between fraud and valid transactions in credit card transactions.

item.description: Supermarket sales analysis An analysis of a supermarket to get a general perspective about sales in its three main stores.

item.title: Analysis with R
item.description: Analysis-With-R A word cloud algorithm was written in R to analyze the speech of the Federal republic of Nigeria.

item.title: Option Price Modelling
item.description: Option Price Modelling project Designed a multiple-step binomial option pricing model in excel to calculate the theoretical value of an option.

item.title: BIG MART PREDICTION
item.description: BIG MART PREDICTION Analytics Vidhya Big Mart Sales prediction Hackathon, where I built a predictive model to predict sales data for 1559 products across ten stores in different cities.
